item.title: Tranquility in the soul
item.description: Dear Amy, How can we know real peace? The fruit of the Spirit is … peace â€• Galatians 5:22 Peace here is the Greek word eirene, which corresponds to the Hebrew word shalom, and could be translated as tranquility in the soul. Who wouldn’t want such a thing? But how can we possibly know such a peace in the turbulent and warmongering world in which we live? Psalm 46 provides insight, and is worth reading in its entirety.
